Description:

Term

Details

Offer

Instant Discount on flight bookings made through IndiGo website (www.goindigo.in) and IndiGo mobile App (whether android or iOS) by the eligible Cardmembers of the DBS Visa Debit Card as per below details:


Offer Construct:


Category

Offer description

Max Disc (DC)

Min Order Value

Flight- (Dom & Int)

Flat 15% Instant Discount

2,500

5,000

 

For Dom & INT Flight category:

Instant discount of a maximum of INR 2500/- 15% on the transaction value of the Dom flight & INT Flight booking, whichever is lower. 
Instant discount is applicable only on a minimum transaction value of INR 5000 and onwards.
The Instant discount can be availed only upon applying the Promo Code DBSDCFLY while making a booking on IndiGo website/mobile app.
Offer is valid Once per card per product through-out the Offer Period.
This offer is only applicable on DBS visa debit card.
 

Offer Period

The Offer is valid from 1st Dec to 10th Dec 2025 (including both the dates) (Offer Period)

Terms prescribed by Parties for the Offer to the Cardmembers

This Offer cannot be combined with any other ongoing offer on the Website.
The Offer is valid on Domestic & International flights bookings offered by IndiGo except codeshare bookings.
The Company will enable instant discounts for Cardmembers of DBS Visa Debit Cards only when the Promo Code shall be entered by the Cardmember at the time of payment on the payment page.
·    The Flight Offer is valid only on a minimum booking amount of INR 5000/- (inclusive of taxes) and onwards.
The discount will be applied on One way and Round Trip on regular fares (Saver, Flexi, Super 6E).
This offer is not applicable on 6E Exclusive Fare & Sales Fare.
The offer is valid only on the eligible BINs shared by DBS Visa Debit cards. If the BIN series of the card does not match with the one provided by the Bank to IndiGo, then the cardholder shall approach the respective Bank and Bank shall be entitled to withhold or deny the offer to the customer.
The Offer can be redeemed only once per Card  during the Offer Period and shall be applied to the first valid transaction made on the Card during the Offer Period.
All complaints, claims, disputes, concerns, issues, etc, regarding flight bookings, rescheduling and cancellation should be taken up by Cardmembers directly with IndiGo.
All bookings made under this Offer shall be subject to all terms and conditions (available at www.goindigo.in) as applicable to the Cardmembers Flight Booking, including IndiGos conditions of carriage.
The Offer is not applicable on EMI transactions.
The Offer is designed for "Business to Customers transactions only. Hold bookings (incomplete payments made under a PNR) or group bookings (bookings with 9 passengers or more booked under the same PNR) for IndiGo flights, and IndiGo Flight Bookings made through travel agents, or by corporates, or through platforms other than those listed in point 1 above, are not eligible for the Offer.
In case of partial/full cancellation of the flight booking, the Offer stands void and the Cardmember will not be eligible for the discount.
If there is any rescheduling or cancellation, Cardmember shall bear the fare difference (regardless of whether the component is in the base fare or in tax + surcharge) and other applicable rescheduling/cancellation fees.
The Offer cannot be clubbed with any other offer of the Company. Neither the Offer can be assigned or transferred to any other person.
